scripts.wipe: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules elm-stuff
scripts.boot: npm run wipe ; npm install ; npm run build:elm ; npm run build
scripts.boot:watch: npm run wipe ; npm install ; npm run watch
scripts.build:css: cssnext index.css | cleancss -o ../public/build/index.css ; npm run build:css:prefix
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir ../public/build && npm run build:elm ; npm run build:css
scripts.watch: npm run build ; npm run watch:elm & npm run watch:css
